name: Scout
headline: AI-powered student information system for K-12 schools
description:
The student information system (SIS) is the core system of record in every K-12 school. It tracks students, attendance, grades, schedules, staff, and more - kind of like the ERP for schools.

Legacy SIS providers do just about that, and not much more. School districts layer dozens of tools on top of their SIS to fill in the gaps.

Scout is an AI-powered student information system that automates school- and district-wide busywork, from day-to-day operations like attendance tracking to annual compliance reports. Our mission is to help school districts run like high-performing organizations, enabling them to provide high-quality, personalized instruction to every student.

founders.name: Noah Fichter, Founder
founders.description: Building the next generation of digital infrastructure for America's schools

## The only SIS built specifically for you.
California independent study schools have to deal with neverending paperwork, compliance, and reporting. Your SIS should help you with that, without charging you an arm and a leg for every mundane request. With Scout, you can be confident that your school is compliant, so you can focus on what matters.
[Book a demo](https://scoutforschools.com/<https:/calendly.com/noah-teachwithscout>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6785f8ad671f272a97b2f45c_image%20\(1\).png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f85628b5cc23c2b7077bb3_pexels-max-fischer-5212695.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8562737d8e0032ded288a_pexels-divinetechygirl-1181487.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/66f8562737d8e0032ded2764_pexels-pixabay-256395.jpg)
### Best-in-class data security.
Protecting your school’s sensitive information is our top priority. Scout employs advanced encryption protocols, multi-factor authentication, and regular security updates to ensure your data is always secure. We comply with all federal and state regulations, including FERPA, COPPA, and California's data requirements (SOPIPA), to safeguard student records and personal information. With real-time monitoring and automated backups, you can trust that your school’s data is protected against threats, breaches, and data loss.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6711de20607c3893600de2e2_sec3.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6711de200284b44bb4b2f1fd_sec4.png)
### Compatible with more than 50 platforms.
Scout is compatible with more than 50 of the world's leading online learning platforms, and we're continuously adding more integrations.If there's a platform your school or district uses that isn't already covered, Scout's proprietary secure AI technology means we can add a new integration in days, not months.
### World-class support, wherever you are.
Our commitment to your success doesn’t end at implementation. As a Scout client, you'll get access to our executive team in whatever medium you use for communication: Teams, Slack, email, WhatsApp, you name it. Say goodbye to waiting for a request to be escalated 10 times over the course of a year, and say hello to 15 minute response times from our founders.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66f8456c64b489d660cbeec8/6711de2088cf85438ad4495b_sec5.png)
## Made with love in San Francisco.
With over 15 years of experience building software, Scout is backed by a team you can trust. We build software with independent study schools, for independent study schools.

**Scout: Revolutionizing K-12 School Management with AI**

**Overview**  
Scout, founded in 2024 and based in New York, is an innovative student information system (SIS) designed specifically for K-12 schools. It emerged from the realization that traditional SIS providers often fall short, only covering essential data like student tracking, grades, and attendance. In many cases, schools end up using a patchwork of tools to manage operations. Scout aims to replace this chaos with an AI-powered, fully integrated system that streamlines school and district administration.

**Mission**  
The mission of Scout is clear: to help school districts operate as high-performing organizations. By automating the routine, such as attendance tracking and compliance reporting, Scout frees up educators to focus on delivering personalized education. They want to ensure that every student receives the instruction they deserve without the administrative burden weighing them down.

**Key Features**  
What sets Scout apart? Here are some highlights:

1. **AI-Powered Automation**: Automates over 50% of teachers’ administrative tasks, significantly boosting productivity.
2. **Comprehensive Tools**: Provides features like attendance tracking, regulatory compliance, and document management.
3. **Integrations**: Compatible with over 50 online learning platforms, quickly adding new integrations to fit unique school needs.
4. **Data Security**: Prioritizes safety with advanced encryption and real-time monitoring, complying with all relevant legal standards to protect student data.
5. **Exceptional Support**: Offers world-class, responsive customer service, ensuring direct access to the executive team for any issues or questions.

**The Vision**  
Scout builds its software with the understanding that independent study schools, particularly in California, face unique challenges related to paperwork and compliance. Their system tackles these issues head-on, allowing educators to redirect their energies toward teaching rather than drowning in bureaucracy.

**The Team**  
Scout is a lean operation, currently staffed with a team of two, but backed by the expertise and resources of Y Combinator, where it’s part of Batch W25. Aaron Epstein serves as the Group Partner guiding their journey.

**Engagement**  
Interested in seeing Scout in action? They invite schools to book a demo through their website to explore how their SIS can transform school management.

**Concluding Thoughts**  
Scout isn’t just another software provider; it’s a partner in the educational journey, helping schools not just survive but thrive in the digital age. As they put it, “Saved money, saved time, saved headaches.” That’s a promise every busy educator can appreciate.

For more information, check out their website: [Scout for Schools](https://scoutforschools.com/).
